黤字的基本解释

黤
yǎn
深黑色：“玄云黤以凝结兮。”

黤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》於檻切，上檻，影。］
［《廣韻》烏感切，上感，影。］
青黑色。

黤字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【黑字部】　黤； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1520第20
【唐韻】於檻切【集韻】倚檻切，?音?。【說文】靑黑也。　又【廣韻】烏感切【集韻】鄔感切，?音晻。又【集韻】【正韻】乙減切【韻會】幺減切，?音闇。又【集韻】衣檢切，音奄。義?同。

黤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
黤字的起名意思

暂无。

yǎn
Dark black: "The mysterious cloud is condensed."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎn］
["Guangyun" cuts on the threshold, on the threshold, and shadows. ]
["Guang Yun" Wu feels cut, upper sense, shadow. ]
Young black.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Black Word Department] 　黤; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1520 No. 20
[Tang Yun] Yu Shuanqi [Jiyun] Lean Shuanqi, "Yin". 【Said the text】Tianhei also.　[Guangyun] Wuganqi [Jiyun] Wuganqi,? The sound is dark. Also [Jiyun] [Zhengyun] Yi reduced cut [Yunhui] Unit reduced cut, the sound is dark. Also 【Jiyun】The clothes are inspected and cut, and the sound is dying. Righteous? Same.
